How to use the dependency parser from the command line?

= Introduction =

What is needed to run the parser:
 # the 'jar'-file containing the parser, please download anna.jar (tab Downloads)
 # a model for the parser, e.g. prs-eng.mdl, pre-trained models can be found in the Download section for various languages
 # input file with sentences in one word per line format; the words have to be tagged, lemmatized and for some languages morphologic tags should be provided as well (e.g. German)
